original_text: The Pharisees heard the news that many people were joining Jesus' group of disciples. They heard that Jesus was baptizing more disciples than John was baptizing.
korean_text: 예수께서 제자를 삼고 세례를 베푸시는 것이 요한보다 많다 하는 말을 바리새인들이 들은 줄을 주께서 아신지라

sentences.original_text: They heard that Jesus was baptizing
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수님이 세례를 베푸고 있다는 것을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: more disciples than John was baptizing
sentences.korean_translation: 요한이 세례 베푸는 것보다 더 많은 제자들을
